item.title: Russia hits back at Europe's big plan to loan Moscow's frozen cash to Ukraine
item.description: Russia's central bank says it is suing Belgium's Euroclear in court following an EU bid to use Russian assets to aid Ukraine.

item.title: Germany accuses Russia of air traffic control cyber-attack
item.description: The Russian ambassador is summoned over a cyber-attack on air traffic control and attempted electoral interference.

item.title: RSF commander linked by BBC Verify to Sudan massacre sanctioned in UK
item.description: The UK accuses Al-Fateh Abdullah Idris, also known as Abu Lulu, of committing acts of violence against civilians.

item.title: Disguises, freezing waves, and a special forces veteran: Inside mission to sneak Nobel winner out of Venezuela
item.description: The man who led the operation says María Corina Machado crossed “very rough seas” in “pitch-black darkness”.

item.title: Inside the Colombian cathedral built 180m underground
item.description: The idea came from the miners building makeshift altars in the mine in the 1930s, to pray for their safety before starting their shifts.
